def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_close = all_close([x, y], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_small = is_small(y, ctx)
        check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)
        check_y_below_right = are_below_right([y], [x], ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_close
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_small
            and check_y_dark
            and check_y_below_right
        ):
            results.append([x, y])
    return results
state = turn(state)
